snippet: Adam Lind doubled twice to drive in three runs and Melky Cabrera added a homer and three hits, lifting the Toronto Blue Jays to an 8-2 victory over the Detroit Tigers on Wednesday night....

headline.print_headline: Surging Blue Jays Beat Slumping Tigers 8-2
headline.main: Surging Blue Jays Beat Slumping Tigers 8-2

lead_paragraph: Adam Lind doubled twice to drive in three runs and Melky Cabrera added a homer and three hits, lifting the Toronto Blue Jays to an 8-2 victory over the Detroit Tigers on Wednesday night.
